summary: Page 28 (book page 48/mem-chet). Covers continuation of section 100, then sections 101-105. All section numbers match correctly. The page covers the 'אהבה ויראה' topic area. Section 102 has multiple body paragraphs correctly captured.

issues.description: The OCR text includes 'וגרוס המטא' which is likely a misread. The Hebrew text in the image probably reads 'וגרע דהמצוה' or 'וגרס דהמצוה' - discussing the diminishment of the mitzvah when a person might later sin.
issues.original_text: הוא לחשב גמול וגרוס המטא אח"כ ועבירה יכנה מצוה
issues.corrected_text: הוא לחשב גמול וגרס דהמצוה אח"כ ועבירה יכנה מצוה

issues.description: The text has 'והנה לדיק כזה' which should be 'והנה לצדיק כזה'. The word צדיק was truncated to 'לדיק'.
